TextBody:
Hi Christopher,

Thank you for the remote session!

As we spoke we applied the Offline Hotfix. We checked the logs and we had logs from today.

Regarding the fix on the client side for the vulnerabilities we have the below clients containing the fix:

MacOS: https://download.endpointprotector.com/custom_agent/EppClientVulnerability/EPPMac3.0.2.2005.Notarized.tar

Windows: https://download.endpointprotector.com/custom_agent/EppClientVulnerability/EPPClient_v6.2.2.2005.zip

We are closing this ticket.

Best Regards,
Flaviu Moldovan | Technical Support Engineer
